Uses of Package
com.palantir.ptoss.cinch.core

Packages that use com.palantir.ptoss.cinch.core
com.palantir.ptoss.cinch.core The core classes that implement the cinch binding framework. 
com.palantir.ptoss.cinch.example.demo Fully-featured demo of the Cinch library. 
com.palantir.ptoss.cinch.example.extension   
com.palantir.ptoss.cinch.example.simple A couple of simple demo programs that show single features of Cinch. 
com.palantir.ptoss.cinch.example.superdemo An example showing how inheritance interacts with Cinch. 
com.palantir.ptoss.cinch.swing Classes used to bind Swing components to BindableModel objects. 
com.palantir.ptoss.util A collection of generic utility code that this package depends upon. 
 

Classes in com.palantir.ptoss.cinch.core used by com.palantir.ptoss.cinch.core
BindableModel
          A model that can have bindings applied to it.
Binding
          Interface for Binding objects.
BindingContext
          A BindingContext holds information about how to bind various parts of a Java Object.
Bindings
           All Bindings are called when ModelUpdates.ALL is called.
BindingWiring
           
CallOnUpdate
          An annotation to mark that a method should be called when the bound model updates in a specific way.
ModelUpdate
          A marker interface to designate that an Enum is intended to be used as a model update specifier.
ModelUpdates
          Pre-defined ModelUpdate types with special meanings to the framework.
ObjectFieldMethod
          A simple tuple of an object, a field on that object's class, and a method of that object's class.
WeakBindableModelSupport
          A stand-alone implementation of BindableModel.
